did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.physdesc: The collection contains one item consisting of approximately 20 pages.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Robert A. Paine Notebook, Accession# mss 00455, Virginia Military Institute Archives

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Robert Alexander Paine, b. 1859, Richmond., VA; Virginia Military Institute Class of 1881; businessman and civil engineer; d. 1929, Ashland, VA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one manuscript notebook compiled by VMI Cadet Robert A. Paine in 1879. The book contains lyrics of songs popular during the 1870's
